summary.purpose: Provides an Express middleware factory that recursively trims whitespace from all string values in the request body.
summary.problem_solved: Prevents user input with leading/trailing whitespace from causing validation failures or data inconsistencies, without requiring manual trimming in every route handler.

internal.why_used: Imports the MW type for Express middleware signature.

exports.name: trim_body_middleware
exports.description_one_line: Middleware factory that recursively trims all string values in req.body.

symbols.name: trim_body_middleware
symbols.description_one_line: Middleware factory that recursively trims all string values in req.body.

returns.description: Express middleware that mutates req.body by trimming all string values.

details.what_it_does: Returns a middleware that checks if req.body is a non-null object, then replaces it with trim_strings(req.body) which recursively trims all string values. Calls next() after trimming.
